inn1.comm: huge appeal first up, that ball pitched outside off stump and cut back into Strauss who shouldered arms, the ball hits him in the line of off stump but it was definitely too high to be given lbw
Lee bounces Strauss who ducks under it, nice and friendly start from Lee
fullish length outside off stump, Strauss plays back and pushes into into covers
good length ball on middle and off stump, that rears up at Strauss who stands on the back foot and plays it back to the bowler

too full from Lee and on middle and leg stump, Strauss moves across and pushes it wide of Brad Hogg at mid-on, he's off the mark with a single, there could have been more but Hogg dived sharply to his left to save runs
good length outside off stump, Loye plays it to point on the back foot
full ball outside off stump, Strauss tries to drive it through cover but the ball swings into him and he gets a bottom edge for a single behind square on the leg side
full and wide outside off stump, Loye chops down at it and collects a single to third man
short of  alength ball but it drifts down leg side and a wide is called, the first extra of the innings
fullish length and drifting on to the pads again, flicked down to fine leg for another single
pitches on a good length outside off stump and seams away from the right-hander, Loye lets it go
and again, identical ball and Loye watches it seam away from him and through to Gilchrist
hits a good length outside off stump, Loye pushes forward and uses soft hands to guide it wide of Clarke at point for a single
good length ball pitching just outside off stump and angling into Loye who plays forward and defends back to Lee
short of a length ball outside off stump, Loye lets it go through to Gilchrist
a touch too short from Lee and Loye latches on to the width on offer to drive firmly off the back foot to cover, Symonds swoops down on it at cover
the bouncer fired in at 146kmh, Loye tries to hook it but was in no position whatsoever, he misses and Gilchrist takes it above his head
a fraction short again outside off stump, Loye drives wide of Brad Hogg at mid-off for a single
hits a perfect length on Strauss's off stump and moves away from him a touch, Strauss begins to fend at it but pulls his bat out of the way at the last minute
defended to backward point off the back foot
here she goes! Loye gets down on one knee and picks that up from middle and off stump and sends it soaring over the fine leg fence, that's his trademark slog-smack and that bounced on the roof!
fuller length from Johnson outside off stump, the angle from over the wicket takes it across the right-hander and Loye defends towards point
fullish length on off stump, Loye leans forward and drives to mid-off
pitches outside leg stump angling into the pads, defended on the leg side
good length ball on middle and off to finish the over, played back to the bowler on the back foot
good length ball on off stump, driven into the covers
slower ball on off stump, Strauss spots it and digs it out
short ball outside off stump, Strauss tries to cut and gets a thickish outside edge past point for a single
and he's gone now! wide ball outside off stump, Loye would have been better of letting that go but he went hard at it and the slash resulted in a thick outside edge that flew straight to Gilchrist
good length ball on off stump, Bell presses on the front foot and defends back to Lee
good length ball outside off stump, Bell lets it go through to Gilchrist
good length ball but the line is wide outside off stump, it moves away from Strauss who lets it go
much straighter this time and Strauss covers his off stump and defends to the off side
short of a length on off stump, Struass plays back and drives back to the bowler
defended towards point on the back foot
good length ball just outside off stump, Strauss gets forward and tries to drive through the line and mis-times it to mid-on
hits the perfect length outside off stump, not much Strauss can do with that other than get on the front foot and block, Johnson finishes a maiden over
short ball and Bell tries to pull it away, he doesn't get hold of it and the ball hits the high part of the bat and rolls down to fine leg for two
good length ball on off stump, defended on the front foot to cover
good length ball on off and middle stump, Bell gets forward and closes the face to play it to midwicket
drifting on to the pads, driven to wide mid on
good length ball on off stump, Bell plays back and defends to cover
a bit too short on middle and leg stump, Bell whips it in front of midwicket for a single
fullish length on off and middle, Bell clips it over midwicket but doesn't time it well enough to get the boundary
good length ball outside off stump, Strauss gets a thick bottom edge and scampers through for a single
shot! Johnson drops it short and Bell gets into position in a flash and swivel-pulls it to the midwicket fence
flicked through midwicket for a single
good length ball outside off stump, it's far to close to the body to cut and Strauss gets a bottom edge that misses his stumps
fullish ball on off and middle stump, Strauss walks across and flicks it to Brad Hogg at square leg
an excellent first ball, pitches outside off and moves away from Strauss who gets drawn forward, he drives loosely at it and gets beaten
strong comeback from Strauss who takes a step and  ahalf down the pitch and drives on the up through cover for four, top shot, his best of the morning
slower ball but it's mis-directed down leg side
good length ball on middle and off stump, Strauss defends back to the bowler
too short outside off stump, Strauss waits for it and cuts down to Johnson at third man who fires the return back into Gilchrist, Strauss was quick enough to complete two
picthes outside off stump and moves away from the left-hander who lets it go
good length ball pitches on off stump and moving away, Strauss defends it to cover
good length ball pitching on middle, Bell plays forward and pushes it back to Johnson
the nick doesn't carry! Johnson bowled the slower ball wide outside off stump, Bell flayed at it and got a thick nick, the ball bounced just before entering Gilchrist's gloves
short ball and Bell swivels to get into position to play the pull shot down to deep square leg
short of  a length ball outside off stump, Strauss cuts to point
good length ball on off stump, Strauss shuffles down the pitch and tries to drive, the outside edge flies wide of Hayden at point and races to the third man boundary
defended to point on the front foot
slower ball dragged short and wide outside off stump, Bell spots it, waits and cuts down to third man
fuller length on off stump, Strauss gets forward and drives to mid-off
short of a length outside off stump, Strauss plays it late and cuts in the air wide of slip to third man, this time he doesn't take on Johnson's arm with the second run
fantastic shot! That wasn't that short from johnson but Bell siezed his chance in a flash and pulled it powerfully to the midwicket fence
too short again and this time Bell plays back and flicks it through square leg for two runs
good length ball on off stump, Bell walks down the pitch, trying to throw Clark off his length, and defends to the off side
gone! that was too close to cut to third man and Strauss went for it anyway and got a thick edge to Gilchrist, Strauss has been playing that shot repeatedly today and a nick was always on the cards
good length ball on off stump, Joyce defends to point on the back foot
Johnson fires it in on a good length outside off, Joyce lets it go
short ball outside off stump, Joyce stands tall on the back foot and plays the square drive to perfection, excellent shot to get off the mark
straighter line this time and a better length as well, Joyce defends back to Johnson
poor ball, a half-volley on leg stump and Joyce clips it neatly off his pads between midwicket and mid-on for four more
fullish ball on middle and leg, driven wide of the fielder at mid-on for two
tucked off the pads to square leg for one
fullish length ball on middle and leg stump, Bell moves across and tries to flick but misses
short of a length ball outside off stump, Bell waits for it and dabs it down to third man
short of a length again outside off stump, Bell guides it down to third man again
angling away from the left-hander, pitching outside off stump and moving further away, Joyce lets it go
good length ball outside off, Joyce takes two steps down and drives to covers
short of a length ball on off stump, defended to point
tossed up on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Bell uses his feet superbly and lofts over mid-off, he times that superbly and the ball sails over the fence, outstanding timing
flicked through midwicket for a single
pitches on leg and middle, Joyce pushes forward and gets hit on the pad
pushed down the ground past mid-off for a single
full ball on off and middle, Bell works it down to long-on for a single to end the over
good length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
slowish delivery, 132kmh, outside off stump, Bell runs it down to third man for two
short of a length ball outside off stump, Bell moves forward and across and tries to run it fine to third man, he doesn't make contact

short and wide outside off stump, Bell looked to continue batting aggressively and cut that hard, he couldn't keep it down and didn't find the gap either, Clarke didn't have to moveat point to take an easy catch
good length ball outside off stump, Collingwood cover drives on the up but doesn't pierce the infield
good length yet again but it's wider outside the off stump, Collingwood watchfully lets it go
defended on the back foot to the off side
sharp single taken to midwicket
defended to midwicket on the back foot
fired down leg side, wide called
chipped back to the bowler, it falsl just short of Symonds who tries to dive forward to take the catch
dabbed short on the off side for a single, Symonds sprints to try and affect the run-out but doesn't hit the stumps at the batsman's end
defended on the off side on the font foot
good length ball on off stump, defended towards cover point on the back foot
short of a length ball too wide outside off stump, Collingwood uses the width to drive off the back foot but hits it straight to cover
short of a length again on off stump, Collingwood takes a step down the track and tries to drive, the length isn't right for the shot and he gets a thick outside edge down to third man
defended to point on the back foot, Clark is hitting a good length consistently, just needs to fine tune his radar
short of a length again and Joyce steps down the track and gets cramped for room, he works it off his hips to midwicket
full and straight, the attempted yorker, Joyce digs it out to mid-on
tossed up on middle and leg, Colling steps down but isn't to the pitch of the ball, defended to midwicket
this time he stays in his crease and works it to midwicket
Collingwood uses his feet to convert it into a full toss and flicks to deep midwicket for a single
slips down leg side, wide called
Joyce uses his feet this time and isn't to the pitch of the ball
pushed to midwicket on the front foot
driven to mid-off where Ponting dives to save runs, the ball rebounds off his body and they run a single
good length on off and middle stump, defended on the back foot

it wasn't short enough to pull and the line was outside off stump, Joyce tried to force it through midwicket and ended up getting a top edge to Mitchell Johnson at mid-on who took a comfortable catch, a very rash shot and England are slipping as they have done in previous matches in this series
good length ball on off stump, pushed to point
defended on the back foot to the off side
short of a length ball outside off stump, Collingwood tries to cut that but the ball keeps a little low and beats the bottom edge
short of a length outside off stump, Collingwood waits on the back foot and punches to cover, Lee starts his second spell with a wicket maiden
defended on the front foot on the off side
Flintoff gets on the back foot and pushes it back to Symonds
worked through midwicket off the back foot for a single
Collingwood usees his feet to step downthe pitch and defend to cover
fired down leg side, another wide

another one falls softly! Symonds tosses it up outside off stump, Collingwood steps down, he isn;t to the pitch of the ball but tries to drive anyway, the ball hits high on the bat and lobs tamely to Clark at mid-off
slightly short in length, worked off the pads to square leg
full length on middle and leg, Flintoff clips it off his pads for a single
pitches on a good length outside off stump, Dalrymple lets it go through to Gilchrist
good length ball pitching just outside off stump and angling into Dalrymple who plays forward and defends
full toss, Dalrymple misses it completely aas he tries to flick and gets hit on the pad, Lee roars an appeal but the umpire says not out, Hawk-Eye says that was just clipping leg stump
Lee fires in a short one that Dalrymple leaves alone outside off stump
defended on the front foot to the off side
pitches on off stump and spins into Flintoff who closes the face and plays it to midwicket
tossed up on off stump, Flintoff leans forward and clips it to midwicket
flighted ball on off stump, Flintoff gets forward again and tries to drive but gets a inside edge behind square on the leg side
quicker ball outside off stump, Dalrymple gets on the front foot and blocks
floated through the air outside off stump, that spins back into Dalrymple who lets it go
defended on the front foot back to the bowler, Hogg finishes a tidy first over
fullish length swinging back into Flintoff's off stump, driven on the front foot to mid-on
fullish again from Lee outside off stump, Flintoff punches firmly to mid-off
short ball outside off stump, Flintoff cuts hard in front of point where Clarke runs across to his right and picks up one-handed
good length ball on off stump, defended on the off side
good length delivery on off stump, Flintoff gets behind the line and defends towards cover
good length again from Lee on Flintoff's off stump, the batsman covers the line and meets the ball with a straight bat
swept down to fine leg for a single, Dalrymple gets off the mark
full ball outside off stump, Flintoff drives to long off for one
driven through covers for another single
drifting down leg side, clipped to short fine leg for one
defended on the off side on the front foot, they scamper a single behind point
fullish length on off stump, driven to long off for a single to end the over
short of a good length delivery, angled across the right-hander and Flintoff watchfully cuts it away straight to the fielder at point
good length delivery outside the off stump and Flintoff drives it away in the air and well wide of the fielder at point. Not sure if he was in full control there.
width offered outside the off stump, steered down to third man
defended outside the off stump

edged and through! good length delivery outside the off stump, excellent line and length and Flintoff is sucked into the drive, ball clips the outside edge and flies through to the gap between Gilchrist and Ponting at first slip. Close call that
driven off the front-foot and the ball goes straight to the fielder at cover
goes for the reverse sweep and connects well, easy two down to third man
100 comes up! tossed up on the stump, Dalrymple lunges forward to defend and the ball rolls away off the inside edge
tight delivery on the stumps, defended watchfully
again tossed up and turning in, not much turn but enough to pay on the batsman's mind. Flintoff gets forward and defends it down watchfully
tucked away off the back-foot to the square leg region
defended on the front-foot and that's the way it's going to be for sometime, so now is the best time to take that coffee break, if you want
good length delivery on the stumps, defended wathfully
clipped away off the pads to the midwicket region
bit wide outside the off stump and Dalrymple pushes at it, a nothing shot and the ball sails through to the keeper
and again! closer to the off stump line on this occasion. Dalrymple once again goes fishing outside the off stump and once again the ball zips past the outside edge
played to cover, Clarke shy at the bowler's end misses the stumps and the ball goes through

and gone! fuller length delivery outside the off stump, fairly innocuous delivery. Flintoff drives away from his body and the ball goes straight to Pointing at wide first slip. Could have left it alone but Flintoff couldn't resist going for the drive and that's sums up England's performance
left alone outside the off stump
turned away towards square leg
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Dalrymple jams his bat down and the ball races away off the outside edge
worked away behind square on the leg side for an easy single
tossed up outside the off stump, Nixon walks down the track and defends it down on the off side
bit of width offered outside the off stump, Nixon goes for the cut and the ball rips through to the keeper
good length delivery outside the off stump and Dalrymple leaves it through to the keeper

Johnson strikes again! two in two overs and England's slump continues. Perfect line and length to the right-hander - good length, pitched close to the off stump line and shaping in late. Dalrymple had to play at it and the edge goes straight to Gilchrist behind the stumps.
excellent delivery first up and Plunkett is turned inside out, just missed the outside edge by a whisker. Johnson is on fire here
good length delivery outside the off stum, slanting away and Plunkett is beaten outside the off stump
short of a good length delivery, bit of a surprise delivery and Plunkett was clueless, horrible little fend and the ball pops up on the leg side, luckily for him Johnson fails to get there in time

that's the end of that! Johnson once again drags it short and Plunkett plays the 'sitting duck act' to perfection, ball clips the shoulder of the bat and lobs up towards point. Clarke moves in quickly and makes no mistake. As simple as that
defended outside the off stump
clipped away off the pads to deep square leg
tossed up on the stumps and Tremlett defends off the back-foot
fuller delivery on the stumps, Tremlett pushes forward to defend and ends up with an inside edge on to the pad, appeal turned down

another one bites the dust and this time it's the googly that does the damage. Flat and on the middle and off stump line, turning away evers-so-slightly. Tremlett pushes forward to defend and the edge is produced. White at first slip swoops low down and make a hard catch look easy
tossed up delivery, defended on the front-foot
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended watchfully
play and a miss, ball rolls away off the pad
good length delivery, coming in with the angle. Nixon pushes forward to defend and ends up with an inside edge on to the pad
short ball outside the off stump and Nixon pulls it away to deep square leg for a single
bit wide outside the off stump and Panesar shoulders arms
good length delivery outside the off stump, better line but not enough to make Panesar play at it. End of a decent spell from Johnson
swept away to deep fine leg, there was a single on offer but Nixon decides not to go for it
tossed up outside the off stump and Nixon leaves it through to the keeper
fuller and on the pads and Nixon sweeps it down to fine leg, run hard looking for the second but Lee hurtles across in the deep and cuts it off
left alone outside the off stump
inside edge on to the pad and the ball pops up on the leg side
tossed up outside the off stump, turning away. Panesar stays back and taps it away towards point
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot
slightly short and angling across the left-hander. Nixon watches it all the way into the keeper's glove
closer to the off stump line and Nixon is made to defend
good length delivery, in the channel outside the off stump and Nixon defends it off the back-foot
punched away off the back-foot to the deep cover region
bowled from round the stumps. Pitched up outside the off stump, Panesar has a small little dab at it and the ball zips past the outside edge
left alone outside the off stump
slogged away towards midwicket

Well as you wish Binoy! tossed up on the middle and off stump line, Nixon pushes forward to defend and the ball spoons up off the leading edge. Hogg shuffles across and makes no mistake. Done and dusted in 34.3 overs

inn2.comm: good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of away swing and Gilchirst leaves it through to the keeper
good length delivery, 144 kmps and Gilchirst edges it away towards backward point
slightly fuller in length, Gilchrist goes back and drives it away through the gap between cover and point. 109 more to get
punched away off the back-foot to the cover region, excellent placement and they scamper through for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump and Hayden drives it down to mid-off. Watchfully played
full and drifting down the leg side, Hayden fails to make contact but the ball rolls away off the pad to the backward square leg region
good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of swing. Hayden reads it well and leaves it through to the keeper
pitched up outside the off stump and Hayden drives it straight to the fielder at mid-off
quicker delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Hayden gets forward and flicks but fails to make contact, ball thuds into the pad and pops up on the track
wayward delivery down the leg side
good length delivery outside the off stump, shaping away from the left-hander and Hayden leaves it through to the keeper

fuller length delivery on the middle and off stump line, again the ball swinging away late. Hayden was caught on the wrong foot but his cross bat push makes contact and the ball rolls away towards midwicket
another line and length delivery, defended on the front-foot
off the pads to the short fine leg region
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump and Hayden leaves it through to the keeper
good length delivery outside the off stump and Hayden leaves it through to the keeper.
wide delivery outside the off stump
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, slanting away. Hayden shoulders arms
fuller length delivery outside the off stump and Hayden drives it down to mid-on. Not a well timed shot and the ball rolled away off the inner half of the bat. He is struggling a bit here
good length delivery outside the off stump, close to the off stump line and Hayden leaves it through to the keeper
another wide delivery outside the off stump
good length delivery on the stumps and Gilchrist works it away towards midwicket
punched away towards cover
pitched up outside the off stump. Gilchirst drives and drives well, diving stop by the fielder at cover cuts off a certain boundary
pitched up on the pads, wrong line and Gilchrist drives it past the diving fielder at midwicket. Joyce with the long chase
left alone outside the off stump
forced away off the front-foot to the mid-on region. Again bit of a cross batted shot, he is clearly struggling here
slightly short and slanting across the left-hander. Gilchrist rocks back and punches it away through the gap between mid-off and cover. Australia on the move
bowled from round the wicket and Plunkett pitches it up wide outside the off stump. Gilchirst jabs his bat at it but fails to make contact
another sweetly timed cover drive, this time off the front-foot and the ball just raced away to the fence. Nothing more than a punch
four more! good length delivery outside the off stump, Gilchrist quickly gets into a good position and drills it through cover point. Fantastic shot
better line and length, defended on the back-foot
take that! pitched up outside the off stump and Gilchrist smokes it to the long-off fence. Hit on the up and the ball just rocketed over the bowler's head. End of a massive over for Australia
off the mark with an inside edge to deep backward square leg
defended outside the off stump
good length delivery outside the off stump and Hayden leaves it through to the bowler
good length delviery outside the off stump, Hayden goes for the drive and once again ends up with an inside edge on to his pad. It's a different story all together at the other end.
much better shot. Good length delivery and Hayden nicely drives it down to mid-off
punched down to mid-off, the fielder is bit late to attack the ball. Gilchrist calls late but makes it across safely. Total cricket
defended on the back-foot
good length delivery outside the off styump, defended
driven down to mid-off. No room for a single there

driven straight back and Flintoff gets a touch on it. Gilchrist called for the single and kept running but Hayden was busy ball watching. Plunkett moved across to his left at mid-off and fired in the throw at the keeper's end. Nixon ran in and dragged the ball on to the stumps. Perfect mix-up.
good length delivery outside the off stump, defended watchfully
off-cutter and Ponting works it away behind square on the leg side
driven in the air and well wide of the diving fielder at point
good length delivery, drifting on to the pads and Ponting clips it away nicely to the fine leg fence
good length delivery outside the off stump and Ponting defends it on the front-foot
good length delivery outside the off stump and Ponting shoulders arms
driven off the front-foot and Tremlett takes it on his follow through
again drifting on to the pads and Ponting clips it away well in front of square leg

good length and cutting in, almost the perfect delivery. Ponting shuffles across in an attempt to work it away on the leg side but fails to make contact. Loud appeal for lbw turned down. Probably hit outside the line of the off stump
defended on the front-foot
punched back to the bowler
good length delivery outside the off stump and Hayden drives it away towards cover
short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Hayden gets right behind the line and defends it down to mid-off
nice little dab down to mid-off
maiden! good length delivery, again close to the off stump line and Hayden punches it down to mid-off
flicked away off the pads to deep midwicket
welcome back Hayden! good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, bit too straight and Hayden finds the gap between mid-on and midwicket. Pefect timing and the placement was spot on
defended outside the off stump
good length delivery outside the off stump, Hayden walks forward and taps it away towards cover, early call and a quick single is added to the total
turned away off the front-foot to the midwicket region, nicely placed into the gap between mid-on and midwicket
driven down to mid-off, again not a well timed shot and the ball rolled away off the inner half of the bat
good length delivery, looked like the ball stopped a bit after hitting the deck. Ponting is early into the defensive push and he ends up with an inside edge onto his pad
driven off the back-foot, straight to the fielder at cover
tight delivery, right on the middle and off stump line. Ponting gets well forward and defends it down on the leg side

pitched up and Ponting drives it straight back. Flintoff fails to take it cleanly and the ball rolls down to mid-on. Ponting takes off for a single but once again Hayden is not interested but on this occasion no damage is done
good length delivery and Ponting taps it away through cover point
defended on the back-foot

fuller length delivery outside the off stump, Ponting gets well inside the line, opens the face of the bat and drives it away through covers. 50 comes up for Australia - they need another 61 to wrap this up.
turned away off the back-foot to the midwicket region, easy single
flat delivery on the stumps and Ponting ends up with and inside edge
edge and dropped! Ponting drives off the back-foot and ends up with a thick edge. Collingwood at first slip fails to hold on to the fairly hard chance.
worked away towards midwicket
slightly short, Ponting goes right back, making use of the depth of the crease and drive it away through cover
full and straight, Ponting leans forward and drives firmly to Panesar at mid-on
too full again and this time the line is middle and leg stump, Ponting leans across on his front foot and clips it wide of Panesar at mid-on for four
Plunkett doesn't learn and again drifts on to the pads, Ponting moves across and flicks it through midwicket for four more
short of a length on off stump, Ponting stands on the back foot and defends back to the bowler
pitches short of a length and drifts down leg side again, Ponting leans across and clips it fine down to the fine-leg fence
flicked off the pads to midwicket yet again
flicked off his hips to square leg
tossed up on off stump, Ponting gets on the front foot and pushes into the covers
fired through quickly outside off stump, Hayden gets forward and lets it go
defended on the front foot on the off side
fullish length on off and middle stump, Hayden pushes it to long-on for a single
good length pitching on off stump, Ponting reaches out on the front foot and blocks
short of a length ball angling across Hayden from over the wicket, Hayden tries to pull but doesn't time it well, ends up flat-batting it back to Tremlett
good length ball on off stump, pushed past the bowler for a quick single
short of  a length ball angling into middle and leg, Ponting walks across and flicks through square leg
short of  alength again outside Hayden's off stump, he stands on the back foot and punches to short cover
slower ball outside off stump, 120khm, Hayden defends to midwicket
another slower ball, 117 kmh, Hayden lets it go outside his off stump
good length ball on middle and off, Ponting pushes it wide off the fielder at mid-on for a single
flicked to square leg where a teriible mis-field from Plunkett allows runs
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
tossed up nicely on off stump, Hayden gets forward and blocks, he's struggled to time the ball today
defended to midwicket on the front foot
tossed up on off and middle stump, Hayden gets forward and blocks solidly
short of a length on off and middle, Ponting uses the angle into him to move across and work it to midwicket
good length ball angling into Ponting from outsid off stump, defended to midwicket
good length ball on off stump, Ponting plays it back to the bowler on the back foot
short of a length ball outside off stump, Ponting gets forward and tries to defend, he gets an inside edge back past his stumps
excellent length from Tremlett, he keeps Ponting on then back foot and induces another inside edge on to the pad
good length ball outside off stump, Ponting gets well forward and pushes it into covers
tossed up on off stump, Ponting dabs it into the covers and sets off at frantic pace for the single
fullish length on middle and leg stump, Hayden clips it wide of mid-on for a single
pushed into the covers for another sharp single, there might have been a close call if the fielder had hit at the batsman's end but the throw is poor and they steal an overthrow
defended on the off side on the front foot
flatter ball on middle and leg stump, Ponting moves across and tries to flick but misses
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
good length on off stump, Hayden just taps it back past the bowler for a quick single
poor ball, short and drifting down leg side, Ponting swivels and guides it down to the fine leg fence, four more, Australia march on
short of  a length outside off stump, Ponting latches on to the width and square drives to Dalrymple to point
good length angling into off and middle stump, Ponting dabs it in front of midwicket for a single
good length again, angling across Hayden, he gets on the front foot and defends towards cover
defended on the front foot towards mid-off
defended to backward point
Ponting drively firmly back past the bowler, the ball hits the stumps at the other end
flicked off the pads through square leg
good length ball on off and middle, Ponting gets a stride in and blocks
worked off the pads through square leg for one
pushes down the ground to mid-on for another single
good length again on off stump from Tremlett, Hayden pushes to mid-on but says NO to the single
Hayden takes a step down and pushes it to covers
too short this time, Hayden waits for it and flicks it wide off the fielder at mid-on for a single
Ponting attempts to pull a short ball but he is very early on the shot and gets a bottom edge to the off side
good length delivery on middle stump, Ponting leans across and drives to mid-on
slower offcutter this time, Tremlett bowls that well and Ponting moves forward to defend
pushed through quickly on middle and leg, defended to midwicket
short of a length on off stump, Hayden gets forward and pushes into the covers
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
fullish length pitching outside leg stump and spinning across Hayden who gets forward and pushes to midwicket
short ball outside off stump, Ponting waits on the back foot and drives through cover
flicked off the pads through square leg for two to end the over, Dalrymple is pushing them through fast and flat
full ball outside off stump, Ponting gets forward and launches into a powerful cover drive that beats Ian Bell
slower ball shaping away from Hayden, he lets it go through to Nixon
short ball and Hayden steps down the track and muscles it wide of Panesar at mid-on for a boundary
short of a length ball on off stump, defended back down the pitch
straying on to the pads, Hayden flicks it through square leg for two more, Australia move on to 101 and need just ten more
take that! Short and wide outside off stump, Hayden slaps it off the back foot to deep cover
full and wide outside off stump, Ponting tries to slam it through covers but gets an inside edge back to the bowler
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
slips down leg side this time, wide called
defended on the front foot to cover
short ball pitching outside off stumpa nd turning into Ponting who goes on the back foot and punches through cover
full ball on leg stump, Hayden pushes it off his pads to midwicket
full ball on middle and leg stump, Hayden drives to mid-on
Ponting latches on to a short ball and pulls it high and far over midwicket, that's four of them
defended on the off side on the front foot
short ball yet again, Ponting gets on the front foot and slaps it in front of midwicket to pick up the winning runs, that's also his fifty, well played Punter!
